name: Fireteam
description:
Take on your friends and strangers alike in this new free to play shooter from Ryan Laley Games. This game features no micro-transactions, no DLC, no advertisements, no costs what so ever to you. Plus! You can follow along via our YouTube Channel and see how to make your own UE4 Steam supported online multiplayer game.

Fireteam is a free-to-play PVP FPS where players take each other on in multiple maps in classic deathmatch action. Come back reguarly for new features and updates to the game including new modes, new maps, and new features; all for free always!
